Question: Orantes upset this person in the final of the 1975 US Open, but this person is 11–3 overall against Orantes in tour events.
Hints: The French Open did not allow this person to participate due to his association with World Team Tennis (WTT).
This person won eight Grand Slam singles championships: five US Opens, two Wimbledons, and one Australian Open.
Being six years older than this person, Nastase won ten of their first eleven meetings.
